mapper.sql: id, command_function, return_data, return_status, manager_password, guest_password, cardno, lock_status, gatewaybox_communicationcode, time, remarks
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from command_record
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into command_record (id, command_function, return_data, return_status, manager_password, guest_password, cardno, lock_status, gatewaybox_communicationcode, time, remarks) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commandFunction,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{returnData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{managerPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guestPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lockStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gatewayboxCommunicationcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update command_record
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
command_function = #{record.commandFunction,jdbcType=TINYINT},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
